column3:
Something like

* Removed the deprecated `size` property of a mempool transaction, returned by the verbose versions of `getrawmempool`, `getmempoolancestors`, `getmempooldescendants`, `getmempoolentry`. Use `vsize` instead.

Should be added to https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/0.20.0-Release-Notes-Draft#updated-rpcs
